channel.title: Code Analysis on Coding Aloud
channel.description: Recent content in Code Analysis on Coding Aloud

item.title: Coding style using StyleCop
item.description: A colleague ask me to share my experience coding with ReSharper and once he heard that I’m not use ReSharper he was even more curious about how I write source codes. Who knows me knows I love NuGet packages and be updated constantly, that’s why I found a very useful package that I install in all my projects as soon I start it. StyleCop.MSBuild StyleCop used to be a standalone application with integration with Visual Studio but that changed a while ago.
